name: Farm Tractor 4WD
description: A powerful 4WD tractor suitable for all farming operations. Features include 45HP engine, power steering, and dual clutch system. Comes with 1-year warranty.

name: Harvester Combine
description: Advanced combine harvester with 3.0m cutting width, grain tank capacity of 4000L, and 120HP engine. Ideal for large-scale farming operations.

name: Tractor Plough
description: Heavy-duty reversible plough with 3 bottoms. Suitable for all soil types. Made from high-grade steel for durability.

name: Disc Harrow
description: 20-disc harrow for seedbed preparation. Adjustable disc angle and heavy-duty frame.
